title: Sevilla and Karen talk Quality, Robert Pirsig, Iain McGilchrist, Meaning, and Mental Health
description:
A list of excellencies!

Sevilla King's excellent channel:  A Quality Existence https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6vg0HkKKlgsWk-3HfV-vnw
Erik Torenberg's excellent summary of Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: https://www.quora.com/What-is-the-theme-of-Zen-and-the-Art-of-Motorcycle-Maintenance
Iain McGilchrist's excellent summary of one aspect of The Master and His Emissary:  https://www.amazon.com/Divided-Brain-Search-Meaning-ebook/dp/B008JE7I2M

Elements and Principles of Design
Elements:  
Line, Size, Shape, Direction, Color, Value, Texture
Principles:  
Unity, Harmony, Contrast (Conflict), Dominance, Repetition, Gradation, Variation and Balance
Limitations increase creativity (Boundaries/Connections/Edges)
Competition produces excellence
